segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I see the adult woman completely zoned out on drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not paying attention to anything else around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water everywhere, and she just stands there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water splashing or see the mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are up to no good behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool, sneaking cookies like it's some big adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is helping him, reaching for treats without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to give way; this is irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the cabinets, and no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks perfect, mocking this disaster inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe adults let things get this out of hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and stop this nonsense right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch such carelessness in a family setting.
segments.speaker: PAR
